amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the provisions of the bill would apply to companies with leases with the Federal Government allowing them to drill for oil and gas in the Outer Continental Shelf.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 111-514 to clarify that the bill would prohibit those with leases on the Outer Continental Shelf from making campaign-related expenditures.
